description: With no deal looking increasingly likely, how have both sides been getting ready?
title: Brexit: What are the UK and EU doing to prepare for no deal?
title_page: Brexit: What are the UK and EU doing to prepare for no deal? - BBC News
maintext: If no further steps are taken, UK lorry drivers would need to apply for documents called ECMT permits to be allowed to enter EU countries. The European Commission has warned that there are not enough of these permits available, which would mean not enough UK lorries being able to travel to the EU to pick up goods to bring back to the UK.
